00049 //Define generator - this can be global because its using convert internally
00050 template<typename SRC, typename DST> class ValuePtrGenerator: public ValuePtrConverterBase
00051 {
00052 public:
00053     void create( boost::scoped_ptr<ValuePtrBase>& dst, const size_t len )const {
00054         LOG_IF( dst.get(), Debug, warning ) << "Creating into existing value " << dst->toString( true );
00055         ValuePtr<DST> *newDat = new ValuePtr<DST>( ( DST * )malloc( sizeof( DST )*len ), len );
00056         dst.reset( newDat );
00057     }
00058     void generate( const ValuePtrBase &src, boost::scoped_ptr<ValuePtrBase>& dst, const scaling_pair &scaling )const {
00059         //Create new "stuff" in memory
00060         create( dst, src.getLength() );
00061         assert( dst );
00062         convert( src, *dst, scaling );//and convert into that
00063     }
00064 };
00065 void ValuePtrConverterBase::convert( const ValuePtrBase &src, ValuePtrBase &dst, const scaling_pair &/*scaling*/ ) const
00066 {
00067     LOG( Debug, error ) << "Empty conversion was called as conversion from " << src.getTypeName() << " to " << dst.getTypeName() << " this is most likely an error.";
00068 }
00069 
00070 
00072 // general converter version -- does nothing
00074 template<bool NUMERIC, bool SAME, typename SRC, typename DST> class ValuePtrConverter : public ValuePtrGenerator<SRC, DST>
00075 {
00076 public:
00077     virtual ~ValuePtrConverter() {}
00078 };
00079 
00081 // trivial version -- for conversion of the same type
00083 // numeric values (use numeric_copy - that can do scaling)
00084 template<typename SRC, typename DST> class ValuePtrConverter<true, true, SRC, DST> : public ValuePtrGenerator<SRC, DST>
00085 {
00086     ValuePtrConverter() {
00087         LOG( Debug, verbose_info )
00088                 << "Creating trivial copy converter for " << ValuePtr<SRC>::staticName();
00089     };
00090 public:
00091     static boost::shared_ptr<const ValuePtrConverterBase> get() {
00092         ValuePtrConverter<true, true, SRC, DST> *ret = new ValuePtrConverter<true, true, SRC, DST>;
00093         return boost::shared_ptr<const ValuePtrConverterBase>( ret );
00094     }
00095     void convert( const ValuePtrBase &src, ValuePtrBase &dst, const scaling_pair &scaling )const {
00096         LOG_IF( scaling.first.isEmpty() || scaling.first.isEmpty(), Debug, error ) << "Running copy with invalid scaling (" << scaling << ") this won't work";
00097         numeric_copy( src.castToValuePtr<SRC>(), dst.castToValuePtr<DST>(), scaling.first->as<double>(), scaling.second->as<double>() );
00098     }
00099     virtual scaling_pair getScaling( const util::_internal::ValueBase &/*min*/, const util::_internal::ValueBase &/*max*/, autoscaleOption /*scaleopt*/ )const {
00100         //as we're just copying - its 1/0
00101         return std::make_pair(
00102                    util::ValueReference( util::Value<uint8_t>( 1 ) ),
00103                    util::ValueReference( util::Value<uint8_t>( 0 ) )
00104                );
00105     }
00106     virtual ~ValuePtrConverter() {}
00107 };
00108 // non numeric values (scaling will fail)
00109 template<typename SRC, typename DST> class ValuePtrConverter<false, true, SRC, DST> : public ValuePtrGenerator<SRC, DST>
00110 {
00111     ValuePtrConverter() {
00112         LOG( Debug, verbose_info )
00113                 << "Creating trivial copy converter for " << ValuePtr<SRC>::staticName();
00114     };
00115 public:
00116     static boost::shared_ptr<const ValuePtrConverterBase> get() {
00117         ValuePtrConverter<false, true, SRC, DST> *ret = new ValuePtrConverter<false, true, SRC, DST>;
00118         return boost::shared_ptr<const ValuePtrConverterBase>( ret );
00119     }
00120     void convert( const ValuePtrBase &src, ValuePtrBase &dst, const scaling_pair &scaling )const {
00121         static const util::Value<uint8_t> one( 1 ), zero( 0 );
00122         ValuePtr<SRC> &dstVal = dst.castToValuePtr<SRC>();
00123         const SRC *srcPtr = &src.castToValuePtr<SRC>()[0];
00124         LOG_IF( src.getLength() < dst.getLength(), Debug, info ) << "The target is longer than the the source (" << dst.getLength() << ">" << src.getLength() << "). Will only copy/convert " << src.getLength() << " elements";
00125         LOG_IF( src.getLength() > dst.getLength(), Debug, error ) << "The target is shorter than the the source (" << dst.getLength() << "<" << src.getLength() << "). Will only copy/convert " << dst.getLength() << " elements";
00126         LOG_IF( !( scaling.first->eq( one ) && scaling.first->eq( zero ) ), Runtime, error ) << "Scaling is ignored when copying data of type " << src.getTypeName();
00127         dstVal.copyFromMem( srcPtr, std::min( src.getLength(), dstVal.getLength() ) );
00128     }
00129     virtual scaling_pair getScaling( const util::_internal::ValueBase &/*min*/, const util::_internal::ValueBase &/*max*/, autoscaleOption /*scaleopt*/ )const {
00130         //as we're just copying - its 1/0
00131         return std::make_pair(
00132                    util::ValueReference( util::Value<uint8_t>( 1 ) ),
00133                    util::ValueReference( util::Value<uint8_t>( 0 ) )
00134                );
00135     }
00136     virtual ~ValuePtrConverter() {}
00137 };

00141 // VC90 thinks bool is numeric - so tell him it isn't
00143 template<typename SRC> class ValuePtrConverter<true, false, SRC, bool> : public ValuePtrGenerator<SRC, bool>
00144 {
00145     ValuePtrConverter() {
00146         LOG( Debug, verbose_info )
00147                 << "to-boolean converter for " << ValuePtr<SRC>::staticName();
00148     };
00149 public:
00150     static boost::shared_ptr<const ValuePtrConverterBase> get() {
00151         ValuePtrConverter<true, false, SRC, bool> *ret = new ValuePtrConverter<true, false, SRC, bool>;
00152         return boost::shared_ptr<const ValuePtrConverterBase>( ret );
00153     }
00154     void convert( const ValuePtrBase &src, ValuePtrBase &dst, const scaling_pair &/*scaling*/ )const {
00155         const SRC *srcPtr = &src.castToValuePtr<SRC>()[0];
00156         bool *dstPtr = &dst.castToValuePtr<bool>()[0];
00157         LOG_IF( src.getLength() < dst.getLength(), Debug, info ) << "The target is longer than the the source (" << dst.getLength() << ">" << src.getLength() << "). Will only copy/convert " << src.getLength() << " elements";
00158         LOG_IF( src.getLength() > dst.getLength(), Debug, error ) << "The target is shorter than the the source (" << dst.getLength() << "<" << src.getLength() << "). Will only copy/convert " << dst.getLength() << " elements";
00159 
00160         size_t i = std::min( src.getLength(), dst.getLength() );
00161 
00162         while( i-- )
00163             *( dstPtr++ ) = ( *( srcPtr++ ) != 0 );
00164     }
00165     virtual scaling_pair getScaling( const util::_internal::ValueBase &/*min*/, const util::_internal::ValueBase &/*max*/, autoscaleOption /*scaleopt*/ )const {
00166         //as we're just copying - its 1/0
00167         return std::make_pair(
00168                    util::ValueReference( util::Value<uint8_t>( 1 ) ),
00169                    util::ValueReference( util::Value<uint8_t>( 0 ) )
00170                );
00171     }
00172     virtual ~ValuePtrConverter() {}
00173 };
00174 template<typename DST> class ValuePtrConverter<true, false, bool, DST> : public ValuePtrGenerator<bool, DST> {virtual ~ValuePtrConverter() {}};
00175 
00177 // Numeric version -- uses numeric_convert
00179 template<typename SRC, typename DST> class ValuePtrConverter<true, false, SRC, DST> : public ValuePtrGenerator<SRC, DST>
00180 {
00181     ValuePtrConverter() {
00182         LOG( Debug, verbose_info )
00183                 << "Creating numeric converter from "
00184                 << ValuePtr<SRC>::staticName() << " to " << ValuePtr<DST>::staticName();
00185     };
00186 public:
00187     static boost::shared_ptr<const ValuePtrConverterBase> get() {
00188         ValuePtrConverter<true, false, SRC, DST> *ret = new ValuePtrConverter<true, false, SRC, DST>;
00189         return boost::shared_ptr<const ValuePtrConverterBase>( ret );
00190     }
00191     void convert( const ValuePtrBase &src, ValuePtrBase &dst, const scaling_pair &scaling )const {
00192         LOG_IF( scaling.first.isEmpty() || scaling.first.isEmpty(), Debug, error ) << "Running conversion with invalid scaling (" << scaling << ") this won't work";
00193         numeric_convert( src.castToValuePtr<SRC>(), dst.castToValuePtr<DST>(), scaling.first->as<double>(), scaling.second->as<double>() );
00194     }
00195     scaling_pair getScaling( const util::_internal::ValueBase &min, const util::_internal::ValueBase &max, autoscaleOption scaleopt = autoscale )const {
00196         const std::pair<double, double> scale = getNumericScaling<SRC, DST>( min, max, scaleopt );
00197         return std::make_pair(
00198                    util::ValueReference( util::Value<double>( scale.first ) ),
00199                    util::ValueReference( util::Value<double>( scale.second ) )
00200                );
00201     }
00202     virtual ~ValuePtrConverter() {}
00203 };

00207 //OK, thats about the foreplay. Now we get to the dirty stuff.

00211 template<typename SRC> struct inner_ValuePtrConverter {
00212     std::map<int, boost::shared_ptr<const ValuePtrConverterBase> > &m_subMap;
00213     inner_ValuePtrConverter( std::map<int, boost::shared_ptr<const ValuePtrConverterBase> > &subMap ): m_subMap( subMap ) {}
00214     template<typename DST> void operator()( DST ) { //will be called by the mpl::for_each in outer_ValuePtrConverter for any DST out of "types"
00215         //create a converter based on the type traits and the types of SRC and DST
00216         typedef boost::mpl::and_<boost::is_arithmetic<SRC>, boost::is_arithmetic<DST> > is_num;
00217         typedef boost::is_same<SRC, DST> is_same;
00218         boost::shared_ptr<const ValuePtrConverterBase> conv =
00219             ValuePtrConverter<is_num::value, is_same::value, SRC, DST>::get();
00220         //and insert it into the to-conversion-map of SRC
00221         m_subMap.insert( m_subMap.end(), std::make_pair( ValuePtr<DST>::staticID, conv ) );
00222     }
00223 };
00224 
00226 struct outer_ValuePtrConverter {
00227     std::map< int , std::map<int, boost::shared_ptr<const ValuePtrConverterBase> > > &m_map;
00228     outer_ValuePtrConverter( std::map< int , std::map<int, boost::shared_ptr<const ValuePtrConverterBase> > > &map ): m_map( map ) {}
00229     template<typename SRC> void operator()( SRC ) {//will be called by the mpl::for_each in ValuePtrConverterMap() for any SRC out of "types"
00230         boost::mpl::for_each<util::_internal::types>( // create a functor for from-SRC-conversion and call its ()-operator for any DST out of "types"
00231             inner_ValuePtrConverter<SRC>( m_map[ValuePtr<SRC>::staticID] )
00232         );
00233     }
00234 };
00236 
00237 ValuePtrConverterMap::ValuePtrConverterMap()
00238 {
00239 #ifdef ISIS_USE_LIBOIL
00240     LOG( Debug, info ) << "Initializing liboil";
00241     oil_init();
00242 #endif // ISIS_USE_LIBOIL
00243     boost::mpl::for_each<util::_internal::types>( outer_ValuePtrConverter( *this ) );
00244     LOG( Debug, info )
00245             << "conversion map for " << size() << " array-types created";
00246 }
00247 
00248 }
00249 }
00250 }
